Where's the reality in reality tv? I honestly have not found one that is anything close to reality. A reality show isnt 15 women twisting the word love into mockery. A reality show would be a bunch of rednecks arguing over paintchips at the home depot. Cmon how is it we've all been consumed by this garbage?

post_info.post_title: Where's the reality in reality tv?

When there is a crew of people and cameras its not reality.
 
 I'm pretty sure most "reality" tv shows are all scripted.

Where's the reality in reality tv? I honestly have not found one that is anything close to reality. A reality show isnt 15 women twisting the word love into mockery. A reality show would be a bunch of rednecks arguing over paintchips at the home depot. Cmon how is it we've all been consumed by this garbage?

 
 Buffalo Bills vs Miami Dolphins. That is reality TV if you ask me. Strategy, excitement, real people, intense competition, and no scripts. We have had reality TV for years now. Only now are they moving away from sports.
 
 But as far as non-sports reality TV, I think survivor is the closest you will find.

"A reality show would be a bunch of rednecks arguing over paintchips at the home depot."
 
 I believe this is what you posted Draco and I must say ... I am insulted by this because... For one thing... There is no such thing as a true reality show because nobody acts the way they really act on camera, even a bunch of rednecks arguing over paintchips... You want a reality show, watch CNN.

I totally agree that "reality" tv is a fake.
 I mean have you ever watched one. I listen to this radio show and their like "I cant believe he picked her and not Suzie Q." ITS NOT REAL. Get over it!

It's kinda scary. Ever heard of "Running Man", a novel about a reality show where you can try to escape like a fugitive for a certain amount of time and either get caught by the dogs or win a million dollars. Isn't there one like that coming? (minus the killer dogs)
